channel.title: How do you make a map hyperlinked
channel.description:
hello: how do you make a map hyperlinked. in many websites you can go to the world map and click you country. what program do use to make that and how. thanks
e.g. [url=http://www.realestate.com.au/]http://www.realestate.com.au/[/url]

item.description:

ya do it

item.title: How do you make a map hyperlinked
item.dc:creator: @Bang_Train Bang Train
item.description:
@Bang_Train wrote:

WE ARE FUCKING TALKING ABOUT IMAGE MAPS U FUCKTARD

god damn…

and mysql_fetch_assoc is correct

its the equivalent of mysql_fetch_array(“blah”,MYSQL_ASSOC);

and plus

wtf. When u type a php function it brings up an autocomplete window, it just doesnt fill it in

Read full topic
item.source: How do you make a map hyperlinked

item.title: How do you make a map hyperlinked
item.dc:creator: @OnlyOneRule OnlyOneRule
item.description:
@OnlyOneRule wrote:

if you get dreamwaever CS3 BETA which i recently downloaded… im not sure about 8 it has alot of php and asp functions ready installed for your use…
the only probleme with these functions is they are all the step before the full version… eg mysql_fetch_array… they have mysql_fetch_assoc as the standard code to fetch something from the database…

maybe this is because its still in beta stage but i perosnally think its better to do it yourself as you get exactly what you want

Read full topic
item.source: How do you make a map hyperlinked

item.title: How do you make a map hyperlinked
item.dc:creator: @Bang_Train Bang Train
item.description:
@Bang_Train wrote:

dreamweaver sucks, its restricted, never use the php or asp functions it has installed as they are never right, they sometimes go to far with the code... all the functions it has are the very basics, which doesnt always return what you want... and dreamweaver doesnt do anything more than anything you could write yourself... it can only do less

dreamweaver doesnt have custom functions so how could it return wrong code?

also has every single function or alteast 90% of them from the main php library and some from other large libraries such as the mysql library

and wtf u mean the functions are never right…[br][size=1]Posted on: April 18, 2007, 11:11:44 AM[/size][hr]and P.S.

WE ARE FUCKING TALKING ABOUT IMAGE MAPS NOT PHP!

dremweaver is much better for image maps then fucking notepad

it shows u with overlays on top of the image where the slices are gonna be for the map

Read full topic
item.source: How do you make a map hyperlinked

item.title: How do you make a map hyperlinked
item.dc:creator: @OnlyOneRule OnlyOneRule
item.description:
@OnlyOneRule wrote:

lmao where do you get your ideas from??

dreameaver… NUB!!!

dreamweaver sucks, its restricted, never use the php or asp functions it has installed as they are never right, they sometimes go to far with the code… all the functions it has are the very basics, which doesnt always return what you want… and dreamweaver doesnt do anything more than anything you could write yourself… it can only do less

if you want one image with alot of slices on it ill give you the simple html codes…

if you have an image with 200X40 pixels this will split it in half with two links…

you can have another image aswell just remember to give you map a different name and id each time

Read full topic

item.title: How do you make a map hyperlinked
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

happy_world:

yeh but dreamwaver allows every image by it seld to be linked not one image which is dived like a map of australia but i want people to click on the every state (means one image which every site is hyperlinked) dream waver doesn’t do the work for you

Dreamweaver must support making image maps… if not, photoshop does iirc.

Read full topic
